Package com.doa.ui

Interface DoaUIComponentI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoaButton, DoaImageButton, DoaPanel, DoaUIComponent, DoaUIContainer
    public interface DoaUIComponentI
    Responsible for providing an interface for UI components DoaEngine will process. It is encouraged by DoaEngine to extend DoaObject and implement DoaUIComponentI if there is need for highly customised UI components. Otherwise, subclasses of DoaUIComponentI should be used. All UI components that implement this interface must recalculate the component's bounds upon mutation of the component.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 2.3
    Version:
    2.3
    Author:
    Doga Oruc

    • Method Detail

      • recalibrateBounds

        void recalibrateBounds()
        Recalculates the bounds of this component.

      • setParent

        void setParent​(DoaUIContainer parent)
        Sets the parent of this component.
        Parameters:
        parent - the container which will hold this component

      • setActive

        void setActive​(boolean active)
        Sets whether or not this component will be active or not.
        Parameters:
        active - true, if the component should be rendered, false otherwise.

      • getActive

        boolean getActive()
        Return whether or not this component is active or not.
        Returns:
        true if and only if, the component will be ticked and rendered on the next frame(excluding function stubbing)

      • getParent

        DoaUIContainer getParent()
        Returns the container which holds this component.
        Returns:
        parent of this component, or null if parent == null;
